content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the deck with my brother, his girlfriend, county offical, son, mysself. my brother turn his head and said look at this, what is it. i walked to the rail and saw a glowing amber/ orange object, a few seconds later another one, and then another. no sound.They were the same distance apart and traveled the same speed. i walk to the drivway and saw the last one  which turned to the east and after a few seconds shot off and was gone.The first 2 that we saw were no where in sight. about 15 mins later neighbors came over and we told them what we saw they saw the same thing, but said there where 5.We only saw the 3. all together there are 10 people that saw them that i know of. i'm pretty sure that anyone traveling on i96 would have seen them also, they were not that high up.
content.summary: Round amber/ orange

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were on our way home from dinner with a family member. we were driving west on county line rd in spring hill, fl when i noticed several strange lights in the sky. i asked my wife what she thought it was and she had no idea. 

my wife stopped the car and she, my daughter, and i all got out of the car and watched. we saw about 8 - 10 orange lights flying in a row. i hesitate to say a row as it was not a straight line. some of them were grouped closer together than others. we watched as they continued over the trees into clear view. i noticed 3 of them formed into a triangle for a minute or so. as they seemed to reach the same area in the sky, the lights went from orange to red and one by one they seemed to vanish from view. 

both my wife and i searched for any sign of navigational lights but could see none on any of them. we noticed no sounds of engines either. unfortunately we were not able to catch any video or photos of the event as we had no cameras with us.
content.summary: At least 8 orange lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: At around 10:40- 10:45pm on 7-10-10 my brother, his girlfriend, county offical, my son and i were on the back deck.My brother turned his head and said look at that, what is it? i walked to the rail and looked over in the direction he was looking.There was a round object amber in color, moving not very fast for sure not as fast as a plane. as we stood watching another 1 came, then at about the same distance apart as the first 2 another one.  i walked to the driveway to see which way it was going. it travel west and shot out of sight. the other 2 were not to be seen. about 15 mins later friends came over from neighbors bonfire and we said we thought we saw 3 ufo's. they saw them too,just said that it was very weird.We couldn"t have been the only ones that saw these,{at least 10 people that i know of.} it was low enough that anyone traveling on i96 could have seen them also. a friend said that last weeek he seen the same thing in fowlerville , and my son said that he seen the same thing when he was on thomason lake last week. they didn't say how many they saw last week at one time and i didn't think to ask. very weird like they were pulsating? guess we would like to know if anyone else saw them.
content.summary: Round, amber/orange.

content.detailedDescription:
Small town in germany named kierspe.I saw a formation of more o less 30 spherical ufos in formation in direction south-east.Were sleeping in the balcon because so hot night.They appears behind a cloud.It was the time before a electric storm.This objects desepears in a moment.Ok my first idear 
was it was a kind of laser show -but iam not sure.It was the night after germany wons uruguay.
greetings (*wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)
content.summary: More or less 30 spherical ufos in formation.

content.detailedDescription: About 10:00 at night we were looking at the stars, had observed how bright venus was on the horizon. we saw a bright object that looked like a white light moving from north to south directly over head. pretty sure it wasnt an aircraft because it was a consistant glowing bright white light no blinking or flashing. moving too slow to be a meteor. it was moving in a straight line but appeared to slow down and speed up at times. we see alot of satellites and planes and this didnt look like anything we have seen before.
content.summary: Bright white light slowed down then sped up.

content.detailedDescription:
Down in the south of the uk where i am,  you don't see many  cloudless, clear nights, so i thought i would watch the stars and see if i could spot a ufo. 


i started my watch at around 11pm, after 30 mins of sitting there, around 11:30 pm i saw what looked like a star, i did a double take as it was moving at an incredible speed. it had the same light as a star, and for all intents and purposes would of been mistaken for one, except that during it's movement, an enormously bright light emanated from the ufo as if it had blown up!! ,  the light stayed on for 30 seconds before pulsating and then finally fading back to the normal star like light it had been in the beginning. 

the only thing i can liken it to, is a dark room and a light is gradually brightened from one bulb, finishing in a bright finale like an explosion 


the ufo was, all the time i was watching it, moving at a very fast speed. it then shot out of view past the window frame, and i lost sight of it. 

the sky was perfectly clear, during those first 40 mins before 11:30 pm , i had seen shooting stars, birds and aircraft , and this ufo was none of those. 

it was not a comet either. the ufo was a navigating at tremendous speeds whilst the light changes were taking place. 

unfortunately i did not  grab my   camera,  because this ufo was so high up and my zoom is rubbish it would not have registered anything except a bright blurry light.
content.summary: Bright star like pulsating flash of light ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at a lookout that over looked the valley.  we had watched the sunset and were simply enjoying the view.  at one point, i noticed a faint red light straight overhead.  it was difficult to see, but both my wife and i saw it as it moved north, slipping behind a cloud.  i didn't think too much of it as many planes pass overhead at night (there is a regional airport below in the valley.)  once the sun had completely gone, we were busy trying to spot venus, which was bright above the opposing hill to the nw, and mars and saturn.  suddenly, from the area over where vesus was, we saw a white light that looked much the same as venus - bright and very white.  the light crossed the valley, passed overhead and continued south, at which point the white light faded, leaving that same faint red light we had seen earlier.  i watched the red light until i could no longer see it.
     now, there are a lot of planes in the sky at night.  the following are the contrasts to the planes.
     - planes fly in a steady rular-straight line.  if you watch and then close your eyes, you could anticipate where it will be.  the light we saw "wandered."  it's direction and velocity varied as it passed.
     - as a plane passes overhead, you eventually see the various lights associated to a plane: flashing lights on wings and/or nose and tail.  the light we saw was a constant venus-bright light, no matter which angle you viewed it from.  one bright white light with nothing flashing.
content.summary: White light passing overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work last night at about quarter to ten, my son spotted something in the sky, he said "mom...What is that?"  i looked at what he was pointing at and it was a square shaped aircraft that had 4 blinking lights at each corner, in the center was a red solid light, it seemed to hover motionless in the sky, but it also seemed to be shifting from side to side.  we watched this thing for about 5 minutes when it just disappeared into nowhere, now i am perplexed about this...I've never seen anything like this before.  it was to the north of galatia illinois, probably at about 1500 ft. up in the air.  there were no clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Spotted a square object in sky on my way to work.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousins house to join in celebrating the 4th of july. everyone took a break from lighting fireworks and all but 2-3 adults and 4-5 children moved into the garage. after a couple of minutes one of the adults hollered to come out and look at these lights, they are really cool. nobody went out to see and after another minute or so he hollered come on you guys, you gotta see this. i looked out and saw all the kids and adults staring into the sky. finally i went outside and asked what are you talking about. the adults pointed to the sky and aked what are those, we've never seen anything like that. i looked up to see what appeared to be 10 or so bright lights traveling across the sky. about 1/2 of them were brighter and seemed to stay in the same pattern. while the others were not staying in pattern with the brighter ones, they did not venture far from formation. at first i thought they were some kind of illumination flare, but when i noticed they were not descending, i ran in and grabbed my camera. about the time i got my camera in working order and snapped a picture, a light airplane came into sight and was flying towards the lights when all of sudden it was like the lights dissapated, disappearing in various directions. i was very excited about what i had just seen and thought the other pictures i snapped as the formation dissapated contained nothing until i downloaded them off my camera and magnified them on my computer. none of us knows for certain what it was we saw that night, but the photos show it was definitely something none of us had ever seen before.
content.summary: Saw group of 15 or so bright objects moving across sky from ne to sw.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 8th 2010, as i was walking my dog at a nearby park, i noticed the sunbeam coming above a cumulus cloud. it was an unusual sight, so i quickly took a picture. then i decided to do a video of it. i did not notice any ufos during the video capture. the following day when i checked my video footage, i couldn't believe what i saw. there was , not one, but four ufos. i am not sure exactly what i have here. at first i thought, maybe they're just insects. but they are way up there near the clouds. perhaps someone with experience in this matter can confirm if its real anomolies or not.


answers:
1. at a park,walking my dog.
2. i did not notice the objects until reviewing of footage the following day.
3. insects flying.
4. three of the objects flew linear while the other, haphazardly.
5. my feelings excitement but was in astonishment and disbelief. i wanted to share it right away, via flickr and youtube. i wanted to see if someone can confirm it real or not.But when i uploaded it, the video playback quality was poor.
6. i did not noticed them during the video capture.
content.summary: four ufos in a video footage i made of an interesting sunbeam and cumulus cloud

content.detailedDescription:
In the year 1957, i was 15 years old . at the night , i relaxed and to look up the star. i saw five light moving, i thought it was a military plane., but i deceided to set up a small telescope to look through, i realized was not a  military plane. because disc was full yellow that was time, my mind was not obvious,yet.Few seconds i realized clearly is a top purple dome of saucer.I amazed it. i run toward my parent's house in prichard,alabama near mobile. i told them about that.They said, i must be 
got drunk or dream something like that. so kept me silent, not tell anyone about it since years. now i am telling the truth.. excuse me, i am a impaired hearing. ok
see, an old draw papers in the year 1957.
content.summary: Five discs.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette. i looked up over the orchard, and saw a bright light in the sky, in the distance. it looked like a huge, bright star. i called to my husband, "honey, come look at the ufo". i knew immediately that it was not the usual air traffic, we were seeing. it was slowly moving downward. but it just hovered for at least 2-3 minutes. i went inside to get my binoculars, to get a better look. when looking through them i could see what looked to be four bright lights, blinding me with a flashing light up top. the light was very bright. as we watched it slowly disappeared behind the tree line. we just walked back inside and forgot about it, till we saw the news, about the sighting. this isn't my first sighting, so i wasn't to surprised to have seen it. and as we walked inside i told me husband, that there had to be other people that saw it too.
content.summary: Bright like a star, with binoculars bright lights with one flashing above.

content.detailedDescription: Last year i thought i saw something and found out it was venus, but in the process of talking to the head of the michigan chapter,i mentioned a purple double orb connected top small and bottom a little larger. i told him i thought it was my late son come to see me as it was his birthday, i also mentioned the red light in my room every night for appox. the last year. he told me he would like me to talk to a friend of his that deals with the paranormal, well and good, but that did not come to fruition. since i talked to him i've had white lights in my room every night but 3. that was directly after i talked to my neighbor and she suggested i talk to a medium. the lights stopped for three nights, and then came back every night since. the red light showing me visions of past lives i was was able to catch three times as i'd trained myself to keep my eyes closed after waking, and just cracking my lower eye open. i woulde see the red glow and turn my head quickly. it had to blink down once and come back up before going out for good. to the white orbs, as far back as 1992 in my other home, i would be lying in bed with my eyes shut and sense a white light over my head, i would open my eyes quickly and it would be gone, and within seconds of closing my eyes it would be back. i would smile thinking it was my late son, maybe so maybe not.  after the purple orb i'm not so sure. i thought i was being electrocuted, i woke up three hours later. as to the white orbs, i;ve seen them on one occasion. i looked with my lower eye into my dresser mirror and was shocked to see my room in a pinkish color it is painted dark maroon and then the orbs drifted into my line of sight, one the size of a volly ball the smaller one the size of a tennis ball. ahh thats what they look like i could never catch them by just opening my eyes quickly like with the red one, a single red one. gentleman i thought for a long time these were my angles visiting, as i read the bible every night when i get in bed, and always say lastly and thank you lord for keeping my angels around me whenever possible. i think we're cracking the code, angels and et's are one and the same, and before i forget it i've had a growth in my fore finger since 2003, it does not hurt,it's just there. i've come to believe over the last year that they are all connected, spirits, god, et's all of it, connected. i can't go into all of it in writing. i can't set that long.  you have my number, i really don't believe a person dealing with the paranormal could unravel any of this, he would be looking in the wrong direction. i would also like to discuss the string theory and parallel universes. it's all connected all connected. [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Orbs, red, white.

content.detailedDescription: I was just driving home from manhattan, (nyc) going northbound on the palisades interstate parkway.  i was descending a steep hill just approaching the new jersey / new york border when i saw a long horizontal bank of round white lights in a row about 2000 feet in the sky. at first i thought it was a new building or athletic field in the hills in front of me.  i then realized as i was going down hill that it was in the sky.  there were no hills there.  the object was in a hovering / still position.  as i was going down the hill focusing on the row of lights in the sky i suddenly saw a bright yellow contained flash around the object and the bank of lights was gone.  when the flash happened and the object was gone i realized i probably had just seen a ufo.  the flash as i said was just contained around where the object was in the sky, the whole panarama of sky didn't light up like it does with regular lightning. that's when it hit me that this was something very very strange.  like nothing i had experienced in my short 55 years here!!  i was and i'm still very exited and a little un nerved by what i saw.  there were no other "lightning" type of flashes for the duration of my time on the parkway (approx. 15 minutes).  i just wanted to stop the cars in front of me to ask those drivers if they saw what i saw. it looked a lot like the recent sighting in china i believe that stopped air traffic for a while.  very strange!!
content.summary: Horizontal cylinder with approx. 10 round white lights in a row left to right about 2 thousand feet in altitude hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I parked here at home then got outta the car, and i immediately saw this bright white light, and it was maybe about four to five thousand feet above us (very close!).��� it was closer than a plane, and it was not moving like a plane; it was weaving a little bit, side to side, as it flew slowly over top of us.

i grabbed the binoculars and followed it for a few seconds, seeing a sphere with all this glowing light coming out of it.��� when i went for the camera, though, it slowly, slowly fizzled out to nothing - despite my pleading aloud for it to stay.��� (i guess it was somebody who didn't want their picture taken!��� ;))

anyway, i saw a gray craft last september, and i just knew intuitively that it was arcturians.��� this time, though, i didn't get a feeling about who it was, but i know they were good and loving.
content.summary: Bright light craft!

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching lights here in hidden vlly for months now. i wrote a few weeks back about the "hidden vlly crop circles'. 
the lights are everywhere, they "try" to look like they are reflections in windows. they are not stationary, they are sometimes white, light blue but mostly golden. everywhere i travel i see them...And much more.
for the last month at the same time nightly, i see a ball of light arrive over the valley. it will then appear like a large star and will then emit smaller lights, almost like sparks. this "star" is not stationary, if you watch it closely you can see it moving.
most of the colored lights try and mimmick reflections in windows, but there are beautiful ones that cruise the hills around here as well.
four nights ago i saw something really crazy...These very bright lights were atop what looked like a radio tower flashing almost a dozen lights all night long! why is nobody else noticing??!!
i watch balls of dim lights cruise the sky around the valley every night. i see bright star like lights hovering around my neighbors houses every night. one night i was peeking thru the blinds at a light in our garden that kept darting up to try to see in our kitchen window!!! if they see you notice them they will go out. (the small ones)
omg!! i can go on...And on and on. this sounds so damn crazy. it is crazy! i need somebody to come out for the night and watch this craziness with me. my brother did once but i really think he is afraid. he won't come back :)
during the day i see these white blobs cruising the hills, sometimes they are on the roofs, sometimes i see white posts where they wern't the day before and then gone the next day only to be back the next afternoon! i see them in the trees. 
there are these tiny light sources that also try and mimmick light reflections at night. they are not stationary either, although i think they try to be. you can tell they are not reflections, they have a very bright inner light that glows. i see them on man made things and sometimes watching me through the tree branches.
one night i saw the most amazing thing! there were dozens of these golden orbs on the ground, just sitting there pulsating...Glowing.
i have seen so much these past months i cannot remember everything off hand. it took alot of prayer for me to come forward again. 
i need an agent to come and spend the evening watching this craziness with me!!!I cannot keep it inside anymore, it is eating a hole in my stomach.
please call me soon~

These appeared  on just  one of the photographs !  did see other ships & a tube structure moving , however what is on the 1st attachment here i did not see but felt something :-)
on the way back from a walk . 
" for he shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee in all thy ways . " ...
content.summary: These photos will floor you !

content.detailedDescription:
As a teenager, i was diagnosed with migrane headaches, so i would go down to the creek bank and write poetry, songs, or just read.  one day, while on the bank of richland creek, i looked up to see where the sun was in the sky, but saw what looked to be two (2) suns, one a little higher in the sky and to the right.  i remember getting up and climbing the bank to the railroad tracks, then up another slope to get on level ground, all the while looking back over my right shoulder at the two suns.  when i hit the gravel, i looked back once to make sure it was still there and ran to get my dad. they knew something was wrong and called him over the loudspeaker, but wanted to know what was wrong.  as i started to tell them, i was heading to the door, just as my dad appeared.  i told them all to come out and look at the two suns, there was my dad and two other employees. i then ran home to tell my mother and she too came outside.  i got on the telephone and called my grandparent's house and told everyone to go outside; i called my friends too (we all lived within less than a mile of one another.  no one knew what it was, so i called our radio station, wksr, in pulaski, tn and talked to mr. nate street, who broadcasted it over the radio.  at about 15-20 minutes later, the object suddenly just zoomed away toward what i would say was lawrenceburg.  i searched the skies, but could not find it anywhere.  by then other people has started calling in about something flying through the air toward lawrenceburg back toward the lewisburg area and throughout pulaski.  

i called wksr back to find out if they had any idea what it was and they said they would call red stone arsenal in huntsville, al.  the next day at school, everyone was talking about the flying saucer or whatever it was.  some people reported hearing a "whooshing sound" over their houses and people outside said something "wizzed" through their area.

the next day or two, wksr, reported that the base in huntsville said it was a weather baloon.  there is no way, no way that thing could have been a balloon; ballons don't just stand totally still in the air without going up or moving.  this thing flew so fast, it was hard to imagine just how fast it may have been going.

the other thing that has always puzzled me is i don't know how long i was on the creek bank.  i have no idea, except that my mom asked me where i was for so long.  at the time, it never occurred to me. anyway, it soon was lost in time and not talked about.  for everyone but me.  

i have a lot of loss time that cannot be accounted for.  i was in the 10th grade when i saw the object but never knew anyone else had complained of missing time, but me.  for years i had what doctors called "cluster headaches," then termed "vascular headaches" when i moved to nashville, tn back in the early 1980s. i often had blackouts, winding up in very strange places, like arising from hedges on the college campus i attended, or walking down a road on the other side of my hometown.  when i moved to nashville, i continued to have the blackouts which scared me because my daughter was around two or three, and i would wake up with her trying to wake me up off the floor where i had fallen or sitting next to me because i had had a blackout. she and her dad witnessed many days of my screaming into pillows because my head would hurt so bad.  i had missing time and cannot account for my whereabouts from around 1975 until around 1998 after i was in a near fatal car wreck.  i was semi-comatose for about 10 months and thank my then husband for caring for me, along with other family and friends (thank you all for your help, if you read this, you'll know who you are).

one day while i was trying to sit up, my nose started to bleed profusely.  my husband got a towel and tissue to stave off the blood, but it poured right through the towel, so he helped me to the kitchen sink and was about to call the ambulance, when all of a sudden, i started hollering that there was something in my nose and it hurt so bad, the blood was pouring down the sink drain and all of a sudden we hear a 'metallic' clink, clink going down the drain.  i told him to get it or take the pipe a loose, but it was too late.  he did take the 'u' trap out but there was only blood, nothing else.  soon after, my nosebleed subsided and we both looked at each other and wondered what it could have been. we speculated that it may have been a bond fragment dislodged during my wreck, but i shook my head and said "no way" that was metallic and no one could ever tell me any differently.  it took me a couple of years to regain my mobility and somewhat regain strength through physical therapy and plastic surgeries. afterwhich, i had no more missing time and my pharmaceuticals for my 'vascular' headaches disappe, along with my blackouts and missing time.     

the weirdest thing is that whenever i have openly told someone about my experience, they too have encountered a ufo in some form or fashion.  it's like we are total strangers and for some reason after just exchanging pleasant conversation, the subject just seems to come up.

i have often sit outside and mentally asked them to come back and get me.  i don't know why, but i still look in the sky to find them.

during 2007, while picking up my kids from music school, on two separate occasions, both on a monday evening around 6:45 p.M. each time,on our way home on i65 south, we saw three lights in the distance, spaced at least a mile or more across (from the interstate all the way across to franklin road, slowly moving toward the south.  i pointed it out to my children and they both agreed that no plane would be flying that low or was that big.  the second time we saw it, it took a slightly different route and i tried to follow it as far as i could but it veered toward i24 east as if headed for smyrna or murfreesboro.  i drove up a hill and we watched until it was out of sight.  i told the kids we could not have been the only ones to see it, but there was no news about the strange lights on the news or radio.  we know what we saw, but don't know what it was.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Oval/round shape mostly white with blue & yellow shimmery halo.

content.detailedDescription:
i was coming home from work late at night. i was driving on us 10 east toward riverside, ca. i am not sure of the time but it was late evening or early morning. traveling east near ontario, ca. the sky is unobstructed and you can see the sky very well. 
 as i was driving a bright flash of intense green lit the sky in front of me. the flash had shape to it, not just a blob of light. it looked as if a giant laser was flashed for less than a second.
 the flash was maybe 15 or 20 degrees off the horizon and flashed upward in direction. 
 i know the hubble telescope had been launched around that time so it more than likely has something to do with that, but it left quite an impression on me. there were no reports of anything on the news the next day that i could find and no one i talked to the next day saw anything either.
content.summary: A bright green flash in the eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were driving home from a family reunion. a couple streets away from our home, i looked out of the windshield of our car. i saw a star-like object fly through the sky at approx. 50 mph. it flew for a few seconds at this amazing speed and then comepletly disappeared with no flash, no disinigration, no nothing. it simply disappeared. the fact that it simply disappeared rules out that is was shooting star or anything of the sort. it was too close to be a star and it was obviously in our atmosphere. my family all saw it and had no idea what it was but still deny that it was a ufo. now, a year later, this experience has lead to the start of my ufo investigation team. the trenton ohio ufo hunters. [web addresss moved to witness information section/tg]  thank you for reading this.
content.summary: Flying sphere over ohio.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my family's car, in the rear seat on the left side. i was looking out the window of the car, approximately 100 miles south of a town in thr southern portion of connecticut, which either puts me in southern new york or northern new jersey, and i was looking at the sky, and from behind a cloud that was to my right, a black, metallic sphere about the size of a marble, possibly a penny, flew out from behind the cloud and for several seconds was in plain view before flying behind some trees and apparently disappearing. my first thoughts were probably something along the lines of, "holy crap! a black sphere is floating across the sky at high speeds!" pretty much, this was a sphere that was black and metallic. it had no blinking lights or moving parts, nor did it have any trails coming off of its back. it was shiny too, almost to the point of being as bright as the sun, but it could have been reflecting the sun's light off of its metallic surface. if flew in a straight line from the clouds to the trees, and disappeared, either by landing, some sort of cloaking device, or maybe it just went behind the car. i spent about fifteen minutes looking for any other of these objects (none of which i found) and afterwords attempted to tell a couple close friends, who asked if i was joking, like if i were to say yes they would call me crazy and hit me over the head with the nearest available object. i have not given my address and phone number because i am 15 (almost 16) and my parents have no clue this ever happened, and if they did know, they would either think i was crazy or take it too seriously and spend hours interviewing me about it. it's not that i don't like interviews, but they aren't fun when they are from a dad who works at an air base and thinks he knows everything about air vehicles and a mom who works with slightly insane people on a daily basis. if the contact information is vital, please send me an email explaining why, and i will give it to you. i'm sorry this report got to you so late, simce after 7 or 8 months, there probably is not much evidence supporting this sighting other than my words.
content.summary: Black shiny sphere soars across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1967, i was 12 years old, in 7th grade.  my mother and i, along with a friend, had gone to my grandparents' home on airport property to collect their mail while they were away.  this was in the area of linthicum [near glen burnie, between baltimore & annapolis, near what is now baltimore washington international] 

the b&o railroad ran parallel to baltimore & annapolis blvd.  we were driving up poplar ave towards the tracks when my mother stopped the car.  something was traveling above the tracks, moving slowly, from right to left.  it appeared cigar shaped, but maybe have been a disc, but looked different because of the angle. it was silver, but not shiny.  more of a brushed metallic finish.  this was not an airplane.  i grew up at the airport, and spent as much time there than i think i did at school.  planes i knew.  this craft/ship/vehicle had multi-colored lights down the side that 'chased' firing quickly and gave the vessel the appearance of moving more quickly than it actually was.  it was large, bigger than a locomotive.  it was perfectly silent.  we watched for about ten, perhaps 15 minutes as it travelled up the tracks, and gradually descended into the gully where the tracks ran, then quickly, it climbed up above the trees, made a hard right and sped off into the sky.

we weren't afraid.  it was facinating, and there was a sense of wonderment about the whole episode.  

this same craft was reported in the baltimore sun paper as having been seen in the area of hampton roads va, where it went underwater and traveled north, then surfaced at the mouth of the chesepeake bay.  
 
the sighting was reported by telephone to the tower at friendship airport and the civil air patrol, but there was never any report made.
 
my mother and i were two of the witnesses.  my grandfather was superintendent at the airport, and gave us the numbers to call in the reports.  this was on a friday or saturday.  on monday, our class had a report due on current events.  we were warned by my grandfather not to talk about it, because we might get a 'visit' [he never said by whom].  someone else  in the class had the article from the sun paper and used that as his subject matter.
 
i've contacted the archives of the sun, and have checked other papers in the area as well.  the washington post was a possiblity but they had no coverage that i could find.  the news american has since been purchased by the sun [in 1986] and they had no coverage either.  i have not found any information in the project bluebook files, at least not in what's posted online.
 
i am wondering if this may be related to a close encounter at about the same time in canada, where a craft landed in a field and a polish engineer received burns and radiation-like symptoms for touching the craft [it was featured on unsolved mysteries around 1989]
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1967:  ufo sighted near airport in maryland.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i decided to go camping at tonkin springs reservoir over the weekend of the fourth. the first night we got there i had a feeling that a animal was watching us, but went to bed and didnt think anything of this.Woke up the next morning with the same feeling my dog was looking off in the distance something was over there. later on that night i was fishing off the bank i was going to walk to the other end and had a bad feeling that something was down there so i didnt go over there. about 2 hrs. later i told my daughter to get my camera so i can take a picture, i took the picture of the mountains and then viewed it and the first thing i saw was a (moon) and another one in the distance i said there is no moon to night so i took another pic. nothing all the clouds are the same took with same setting all pic. are taken a minute apart. the one with the moon has something standing there its the blue color. when u look at it on my camera it comes out in almost a 3-d effect. he is wearing a vest and u can see his whole body perfect. there has been 6 other people who has seen the same guy in the circle. it scared me we slept in the truck that night.I showed my husband and friends that next day we all think that its a ufo it is something for sure. that would be awesome if it was a ufo if you could get back to me that would be great.
content.summary: Took pic and it was there.

content.detailedDescription: The object just sat there over the fountain river not to high i thought it was a plane at first but then noticed it was not moving just hanging there then it faded in and out a few times then just dissapeared into thin air as i was walking home near down town felt excited but not affraid i was looking up because people were still lightin off fireworks not a whole lot just one or two and i was walking from a very good view point of the city i was still on the hill when i noticed the object
content.summary: the object was flat at top and flat on bottom with rounded sides

content.detailedDescription: I was hading down the 79 highway going north from the taco bell and i looked in the sky over by the 15 freeway and all of the sudden two huge looking spotlights were in the air not moving then i continued to look as different color lights started going around it with the two spotlights on it was gigantic bigger then a plan you would see close in the sky. as i continued to drive down almost to pachanga parkway a cop flipped his lights on and shined his spot lights on the my side of the on comming traffic almost to divert attention it was incredible. i see things all the time but this was my major conformation on ufos truly saw an alien ship there is no other explanation it was gone in the blink of the eye
content.summary: Two bright looking spot lights that started flashing.

content.detailedDescription: A slow moving silent object caught my eye as i was gazing at the sky. with the naked eye, it appeared to be metallic glowing yet translucent as it moved across the sky. it was moving two slow to be an airplane and did not have any sound associated with it. the setting was on an amish farm without any background noise.  i went to the car and grabbed my iphone and snapped this picture before it went down behind the tree out of sight. attached is the picture that was taken. in the photo, the object is located above the right side of the largest tree in the picture.
content.summary: A slow moving silent object caught my eye as i was gazing at the sky. with the naked eye, it appeared to be metallic glowing yet translucent as it moved across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house.Was taking pics of the beautiful sunset here,and didn't notice this until i put the pics on the p.C.
content.summary: Tube like object.

content.detailedDescription:
My son first spotted the ufo over our field.  we thought it was a flair or some kind of firework but learned quickly that it wasn't.  we jumped in our car and drove out to try to get a better look at it.  we lost the craft and then started to head home when we saw it again.  it was moving slowly over the subdivision so we went down a street that it was about to cross.  it slowly moved over our car and we then saw it change into a different red upside down parachute look.  it also started to get more clear and not so fire red.  it then took over only to come back about 20 minutes later for a brief time to hover once again then suddenly disappear.

i'm not the type to ever report anything like this but this to me was a real ufo.  nothing can explain what i saw...
content.summary: Looked like a red fireball but then changed shape to an upside down parachute look.

content.detailedDescription:
This could very well have been a plane or some other type of known aircraft, but i have lived near detroit metro airport all my life and this did not look like a plane. i can't say much about what i saw, but just want to see if anybody else saw this same object.  it was silver, cigar shaped and moved like the speed of a plane, but something was different about the trajectory and fluidity of this objects movement.  i really wanted to say it was a plane, but i could not come to that conclusion.  also, this made no sound as all planes do and was not coming from the airport or into the airport.  this object was moving from north to south.

i saw this object while i was riding my bicycle in which i do daily.  i have seen hundreds if not more planes over the years and this one caught my eye as just being different.  again, something just seemed different about this object.  it moved move smoothly than the average plan.  honestly, it was a little too far to determine what it was, but looked different.  the feelings i felt were just normal for i could not determine what it was exactly.  i would of felt different if i knew for a fact of what it was 100%.  i took a camera phone picture of it, but was a very bad one.  if i was in a car i would have followed it from north to south, but on a bicycle i would have had no chance.  just want to see if anybody else saw this object.
content.summary: Object seen in allen park.

content.detailedDescription:
I was following this "orb/satellite" high in the sky and at bottom of the screen i see this flash.. so i decided to stay on it with the cam.. i recorded over 25 mins of this steady flashing.
the flash is about every 22 seconds between flashes. keep watching do not fast forward or you miss it. 
notice.. the stars rotate with the earths turn... yet the flash does not.... so.. what is it? any ideas?

[youtube links moved to additional evidence section/tg]


also, at the end of part two..  a huge "ufo" passes by, i follow it, but lost it.. then i lost my place with the flash, so i do not know when it stopped flashing.
content.summary: While following a "satellite" with my night vision, i saw a bright flash, so i abandoned my target and stayed where i saw this flash, i then recorded 25 mins of steady flashing in space. the object was stationary. the stars were in rotation, this wasn't.
